baseRule.text: 若復苾芻尼違惱言教者。波逸底迦。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 13

translations.text: Ausflüchte suchen oder {durch Schweigen} Schwierigkeit machen muß gesühnt werden.
If a monk speaks evasively or harasses, he commits an offense entailing confession.
Hablar evasivamente, causando frustración: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。不隨問答惱他。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 13

fullParallels.text: 若比丘用異事惱他比丘。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 13

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻違惱言教者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 13

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。故不隨問答。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 12

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！妄作異語惱他者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 12

translations.text: If a monk sow strife amongst the Brethren by wilful prevarication, it is Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu berbicara mengelak atau mengganggu Saṅgha, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘妄作異語。惱他者波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 12

translations.text: Ausflüchte suchen oder {durch Schweigen} Schwierigkeit machen muß gesühnt werden.
Evasive speech and uncooperativeness are to be confessed.
Perkataan yang bersifat menghindar dan tidak kooperatif harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，妄作異語，惱他者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 12

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼故不隨問答波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 12

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。用異事默然惱他。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 12

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。異語惱他波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 12
